At the beginning of combat on your turn, you may pay {2}{R}{R}. If you do, create a 4/4 red Dragon creature token with flying and haste. Exile that token at end of combat.
[i]Ferocious[/i] – Whenever Xiusheng of the Dragon Realm attacks, if you control a creature with power 4 or greater, Xiusheng gains double strike until end of turn.
